rrdworld.name: NHAWK (C# RRDTool Library for .Net and Mono)
rrdworld.author: Michael Corley
rrdworld.description: NHawk is an initiative to provide a thin, complete RRDtool provider for the .Net and Mono framework. The project goal is targeted at providing a C# interface to native RRDtool facilities through appropriate .Net / Mono object model semantics.
